mapper.select: SELECT sgr.GOODS_RECOMEND_NO ,sgr.GOODS_ID ,g.GOODS_NM ,sgr.RECOMEND_GOODS_ID ,sgr.RECOMEND_GOODS_SN ,g.GOODS_KND_CODE ,g.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE ,(SELECT GOODS_IMAGE_THUMB_PATH FROM STN_GOODS_IMAGE WHERE GOODS_ID = g.GOODS_ID AND GOODS_IMAGE_SE_CODE = 'GNR' ORDER BY GOODS_IMAGE_SN ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS GOODS_TITLE_IMAGE_PATH ,(SELECT GOODS_LRGE_IMAGE_PATH FROM STN_GOODS_IMAGE WHERE GOODS_ID = g.GOODS_ID AND GOODS_IMAGE_SE_CODE = 'GNR' ORDER BY GOODS_IMAGE_SN ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS GOODS_LRGE_IMAGE_PATH ,g.GOODS_PC ,g.MRKT_PC ,g.MRKT_USE_AT FROM STN_GOODS_RECOMEND sgr JOIN STN_GOODS g ON g.GOODS_ID = sgr.RECOMEND_GOODS_ID AND g.USE_AT = 'Y' WHERE sgr.GOODS_ID = #{goodsId} ORDER BY RECOMEND_GOODS_SN ASC
